sense.gloss: to be shy, to be bashful, to look shy
to feel shy, to be bashful, to blush
the charms of a uniquely beautiful woman, (so beautiful that) the moon is abashed and flowers wilt
charms of a uniquely beautiful woman, great beauty, (so beautiful that) the moon hides and flowers are abashed

r_ele.r: ちんぎょらくがんへいげつしゅうか

sense.gloss: charms of a uniquely beautiful woman, (so beautiful that) fish stay on the bottom of water and flying wild geese fall from the sky in shame
the charms of a uniquely beautiful woman, (so beautiful that) flowers are abashed and the moon hides
x: 閉月羞花・へいげつしゅうか
羞月閉花・しゅうげつへいか
沈魚落雁・ちんぎょらくがん

r_ele.r: きょうかんせいしゅうち

sense.gloss: secondhand embarrassment, vicarious embarrassment, third-party embarrassment

sdata.j: ↑現代↑↓げんだい↓の↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓で↑錬金術↑↓れんきんじゅつ↓といえば、↑比喩↑↓ひゆ↓↑的↑↓てき↓にしか↑使↑↓つか↓われない。モラルや↑羞恥心↑↓しゅうちしん↓と↑無縁↑↓むえん↓の↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑屋↑↓や↓や↑宗教↑↓しゅうきょう↓↑家↑↓か↓が、↑不正↑↓ふせい↓な↑手段↑↓しゅだん↓でカネもうけをするときに。
sdata.e: In present day Japan, "alchemy" is only used metaphorically; to refer to improper means of making money by politicians or religious hucksters with no morals or shame.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑無邪気↑↓むじゃき↓なのか↑羞恥心↑↓しゅうちしん↓がないのか。
sdata.e: Is she an innocent, or is she just shameless?
